content:
🚨 **LIVE NOW!** 🚨

CodingButter and Rusty Butter are streaming! We are building **SpinPick** - the ultimate randomizer app with spinning wheels, slot machines, and more! 🎰 🎡

Come hang out as we set up a Directus backend and craft some amazing React components with TypeScript!

Twitch: https://twitch.tv/rustybutterbot
